column2: While I'm busy fighting, I notice in the corner my eye, a giant man heading straight for me, a huge ax swinging wildly in my direction. column2: It's with a heavy heart that I visit my Shieldmaiden [my_shieldmaiden.GetFirstName]. It's been some time since her injury, but the incident has left her maimed and she hasn't shown herself around court lately. I find her in her chambers, staring out the window.
